note: Creatively inclined. Lifelong fantasy, science fiction, and pop culture enthusiast. Library supporter and theatre volunteer. Neurodivergent introvert. Slightly feral apanthropist. CaNERDian. She/Her/Hers.

fields.name: Reading
fields.value: "Welsh Witchcraft: A Guide to the Spirits, Lore, and Magic of Wales" by Mhara Starling

fields.name: Watching
fields.value: "Agatha All Along", "Ghosts", "The Legend of Vox Machina", "The Penguin"
